Default package management tool(s): Pacman (will be replaced by Akabei in future)

Approximate number of source packages: 28923From the Sources.gz files in the main, contrib and non-free sections of Debian Buster. On the 2020-06-12, Debian Sid, the development release, have 31717 source packages.
19092[190]Note this number is just of packages in the Official Gentoo Overlay (or Portage Tree). Several hundred other packages are available from other overlays
Graphical installation process: Can be installed graphically (GTK+ and ncurses), but traditionally done by command line (install cd, live cd, netboot, and from distributions).

Default package management tool(s): XBMCbuntu addon manager, own and 3rd party addons

Approximate number of pre-compiled packa: wc -l on June 22, 2020, with default repositories plus packman.

Default installer: None (third-party install scripts only) or Calamares
